data.name: ENF Novels: Dress Code - Linda meets Hugo
data.detailed_description:
The protagonist of this DLC is Linda.
Linda will have to try to get information from Hugo and his two colleagues.
Hugo, however, will not be willing to concede anything. Arrogant and impertinent, the system administrator will force poor Linda to concede much more than she had imagined...
How will the situation evolve? How will Linda manage to get what she wants?

This DLC includes:
185 full hd images
2 animations

data.short_description: Linda will have to try to get information from Hugo and his two colleagues.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1+
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 4GB Graphics card
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes:
The protagonist of this DLC will have explicit sex with three men at the same time: 
- Vanilla sex 
- Anal sex
- Oral sex
